message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper deals with continual learning, which is a subfield of machine learning concerned with learning from a non-stationary and never-ending stream of data. The paper proposes a method for sample selection based on constrained optimization, which is a common technique in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
